Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting Detailsheard jet. opened window to see. saw jet, then saw OTHER big ball of light at apx.5 pm. Ran to get camera. Ran outside@ re tracked@ started to film. Other witnees @ i looked @ object. Then "it" started to move.Power wires keep me to re track. got it back. Object now moving faster @ out of sight. Feelings of delight @ what the F--- is that!!!! Air force F-16 or maybe F-15 was not far behind.

Summary: checked on jet comming in. looked up, saw object. got camera @ filmed
